fields.name: ShowMedicationInformation
fields.fieldText:
Medication Name : {!VarMedicationInformationRec.Name}

Brand : {!VarMedicationInformationRec.BrandNameAlternative}

Initial Recommended Dosage: {!VarMedicationInformationRec.Initial_Recommended_Dosage__c}

Renewal Recommended Dosage: {!VarMedicationInformationRec.Renewal_Recommended_Dosage__c}

Max Initiation Funding Duration: {!VarMedicationInformationRec.Max_Initiation_Funding_Duration__c}

Max Renewal Funding Duration: {!VarMedicationInformationRec.Max_Renewal_Funding_Duration__c}

fields.name: PatientSummary
fields.fieldText:
Patient Details

Patient Name: {!Patient_FirstName}{!Patient_LastName}

Patient Identifier: {!Patient_PHN}

Patient Date of Birth: {!Patient_DOB}

Patient Gender: {!Patient_Gender}
